title: Looking for People interested in Climbing to Challenger
body:
I have accounts in gold and platinum so just near the crossroads as you break into not brain dead player regions.

I would be interested in Duoing, but my only request is you must understand Objective trading. And have some sense of rotations.

I play very strategic and can play most roles but I hate it when I am the only one using a brain in my matches.

Will use discord for comms,

Add me if interested

replies.body: Hi I'm a bronze 5 yasuo main but it's just my noob teammates stopping me from being challenger I'll carry u ez
Hi I'd be interested in duoing, my Acc is p2 and I play jg and adc. I can play anything but top at a good enough level though
Is duoing a good idea though? Doesn't that mean you will be given three monkeys to carry?
